questions.quote: Hey! I'm trying to prevent my friend from becoming one of those guys people snicker at behind their back, because they look ridiculous! No offence to you personally!
A full house? You got a full house? Turn 'em over George, I wanna see 'em. Come on, I'm calling!  What d'you got!
Well, I'm making out my will. Oh, I got a big slice of dough for you, buddy. And you too, Elaine, I haven't forgotten you.
Ok, we got your...got your strawberries, your chocolate sauce, your pastrami on rye with mustard, your honey...
Anyway, like I was saying, I couldn't make the transition from conversation to sex. There were no awkward pauses... I need an awkward pause.
Beautiful women. You know they could get away with murder. You never she any of them lift anything over three pounds. They get whatever they want whenever they want it. You can't stop them.
I got: You enter, you go "Hi", and I go, "Hello." Now.. we need something here..
You're all over the dial! You don't know what you want! I've never seen you stay on anything for more than 5 seconds. Gimme that.
They were his.  Besides, we don't need any of those things.  We have each other.
Well, maybe next time someone's in a car accident you won't stop off for candy first.
